channel.title: Upcycled Shirt on Morja
channel.description: Recent content in Upcycled Shirt on Morja

item.title: ZLATICA
item.description: Meadow spreading down the valley. This is where I first learned to skii. Back in the year 2004, when winter was still winter and we got more snow in the lowlands. In Spring, instead of snow, buttercup flowers are shining here.

item.title: SREBRNA
item.description: Everytime my mom goes for a walk, she says she has to combine comfort with convenience. And she brings home a basket of fresh mushrooms, flowers for tea, wild garlic for cream soups, etc. This time we came home with a camera full of photos.
